channel.title: Jonathan Hickman on jverkamp.com
channel.description: Recent content in Jonathan Hickman on jverkamp.com

item.title: Ultimate Comics Ultimates by Jonathan Hickman, Vol. 2
item.description:
Well that escalated again’ly.

Given the number of sudden super powered threats, it’s not over surprising. But in a world reeling… I’m doubtful we’ll get the gravitas this deserves.

A lot certainly happens, but I find it hard to be invested in any of it. Onward!

item.title: Ultimate Comics Hawkeye
item.description:
So Hawkeye.

He’s been around this whole time… and only sort of in the spotlight. Which I suppose us par for the course for him.

It’s interesting getting a bit more about what else was going on right when Reed came back.

Even if it’s weird to have both happening at once.

It’s a fine story. Just… fine.

item.title: Ultimate Comics Ultimates by Jonathan Hickman, Vol. 1
item.description:
And so we’re back with the Ultimates…

… and things are going very. very sideways.

Because there’s a new* villain in town.

This should be interesting.

item.title: Ultimate Comics Thor
item.description:
Ultimate Thor. Ages ago, in Asgard. Decades ago, attacked by Nazis. And not that long ago, having a conversation with Dr. Blake—an old friend?

It’s not a bad story, although it feels weird as both a stand-alone and where it is in the Ultimate universe. What with Thor dead in Ultimatum and all.

Or is he…
